name: test_e2e_with_logs[045_XSS_ENC_001]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `XSS_ENC_001` |
| **Name** | HTML entity encoded script tag |
| **Category** | XSS |
| **Subcategory** | encoding_bypass |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `<script>alert(1)</script>`
- **Encoded**: `%26%2360%3Bscript%26%2362%3Balert(1)%26%2360%3B%2Fscript%26%2362%3B`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~25000ms
- **Timestamp**: 06:16:32.000 UTC

## Detection Evidence

**Falco Log Entry**:
